description: Insolar is building an open-source enterprise-grade blockchain platform to enable seamless interactions between companies and new growth opportunities powered by distributed trust The Insolar platform is powered by blockchain as a service (BaaS) architecture. By putting enterprises on trusted, scalable and transparent networks, Insolar enables busines to slash costs and risks, to increase velocity and discover new revenue streams. Synced inter-company workflow Insolar resolves the issues of individual systems, which results in agreed, immutable histories of interactions. Inter-company connections are automated and streamlined on a unified platform built on the everything-is-a-contract principle. Cutting-edge DLT technologies Intra- and inter-company interactions based on unified, fault-tolerant processes and transactions. Utilize customized distributed solutions and networks tailored to precise use-cases. Check out CoinBureau for the full review of Insolar.
name: Insolar
